trans-unit.source: Use Emoji emoticon within Push Notifications
trans-unit.target: Use Emoji emoticon within Push Notifications

trans-unit.source: How to use Emoji emoticons within your push notifications
trans-unit.target: How to use Emoji emoticons within your push notifications

trans-unit.source: Use Emoji emoticon within Push Notifications
trans-unit.target: Use Emoji emoticon within Push Notifications

trans-unit.source: You can include Emoji emoticons in you push notification.
trans-unit.target: You can include Emoji emoticons in you push notification.

trans-unit.source: Currently, Azure Mobile Engagement only supports the 3 bytes Emoji emoticon set for in and out of app text notifications.
trans-unit.target: Currently, Azure Mobile Engagement only supports the 3 bytes Emoji emoticon set for in and out of app text notifications.

trans-unit.source: First you need to find a 3 bytes Emoji emoticon library.
trans-unit.target: First you need to find a 3 bytes Emoji emoticon library.

trans-unit.source: You can find all Emoji emoticons you can use at the following <link><linkText>link</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: You can find all Emoji emoticons you can use at the following <link><linkText>link</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Go to the Reach tab on the the Azure Mobile Engagement portal.
trans-unit.target: Go to the Reach tab on the the Azure Mobile Engagement portal.

trans-unit.source: Select the type of your push notification (Announcement, polls etc).
trans-unit.target: Select the type of your push notification (Announcement, polls etc).

trans-unit.source: For this example we choose an announcement push.
trans-unit.target: For this example we choose an announcement push.

trans-unit.source: Specify the different fields of the notification until you reach the text of the notification.
trans-unit.target: Specify the different fields of the notification until you reach the text of the notification.

trans-unit.source: This is where you will add your Emoji Emoticon.
trans-unit.target: This is where you will add your Emoji Emoticon.

trans-unit.source: You can choose to put it in the title, the message, or both.
trans-unit.target: You can choose to put it in the title, the message, or both.

trans-unit.source: Cut the Emoji emoticon you want to use from the previous link.
trans-unit.target: Cut the Emoji emoticon you want to use from the previous link.

trans-unit.source: Paste it directly in the title and/or message, at the place you chose.
trans-unit.target: Paste it directly in the title and/or message, at the place you chose.

trans-unit.source: Complete the other fields for the notification and save it.
trans-unit.target: Complete the other fields for the notification and save it.

trans-unit.source: When you run a test or activate the announcement you will see a notification with the emoticon as specified.
trans-unit.target: When you run a test or activate the announcement you will see a notification with the emoticon as specified.
